contacts.text: If you need help to realize your web project, build an application, a website or an e-commerce, send us an email...
footer.text: Handcrafted by Pixelcutter _©{{year}}_ | We are based in Florence (Italy), but We are citizens of the world!
home.cta.title: Tell us your idea, we'll make it together
projects.text: It may be because of an especially interesting idea, the technical challenges that tested us, or, most likely, the fascinating people we met along the way, but some projects inevitably stay closer to our hearts than others. Here is our personal selection…
projects.title: Projects in our hearts…
meta.title: Pixelcutter - Digital tailoring
meta.description: We make real your ideas and make them unique, with an handmade design and development.
